dict.string: We use your location to help assign your complaint to the nearest service provider and improve response times. Your location is only used when you are placing a complaint and ensuring the right team is dispatched to your area.

We use your location to help assign your complaint to the nearest service provider and improve response times. Your location is only used when you are placing a complaint and ensuring the right team is dispatched to your area.

We use your location to help assign your complaint to the nearest service provider and improve response times. Your location is only used when you are placing a complaint and ensuring the right team is dispatched to your area.
We need access for recording audio in certain features of the app.
We need access to your photo library to display picture when updating your profile
We need access to your Camera to take picture when updating your profile
We need access to your microphone for recording audio when you are placing a complaint.
